item.title: Having Lots Of Single Men Is Very Dangerous For Society
item.description: Having Lots Of Single Men Is Very Dangerous For Society Leads to [[Incel]] culture, and men can do stupid and violent things when they are unable to find a mate.

item.title: Women Are More Valuable Than Men
item.description: Women Are More Valuable Than Men A population’s reproduction rate is limited by the number of females rather than males.
